body {
  position: relative;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-top: 0; }

#header {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  height: 40px;
  background-color: lightblue; }
  #header .lHeader {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: 3px;
    font-size: 30px; }
    #header .lHeader a {
      color: #000000;
      text-decoration: none; }
      #header .lHeader a:hover {
        color: red; }
    #header .lHeader span {
      margin-left: -5px;
      margin-right: -5px;
      color: #000000; }
    #header .lHeader .l {
      color: #737373; }
  #header .rHeader {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: 8px;
    position: relative;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px; }
    #header .rHeader a {
      color: #000000;
      text-decoration: none; }
      #header .rHeader a:hover {
        color: red; }
    #header .rHeader span {
      margin-left: -5px;
      margin-right: -5px;
      color: #000000; }
    #header .rHeader .l {
      color: #737373; }

  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 20px auto; }

    background-color: #f7f7f7; }
    #section .lSection ul {
      margin-left: -30px; }

        margin: 10px 30px;

        width: inherit; }
        #section .lSection ul li a {
          color: #000000;
          text-decoration: none; }
          #section .lSection ul li a:hover {
            color: red; }

    margin-right: 20px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    background-color: #ffffff; }

      display: flex;
      flex-direction: row; }
      #section .mSection .souSuo .sou input {
        width: 460px;
        height: 30px; }
      #section .mSection .souSuo .submit input {
        border: 0 #68abda;
        background-color: #68abda;
        left: -10px;
        height: 35.9px;
        width: 50px; }
    #section .mSection .title {
      font-size: 24px;
      font-weight: 800;
      margin-top: 40px; }

      margin-top: -5px; }
      #section .mSection .newApply ul {
        list-style-type: none; }

          margin-left: -40px;

          height: 22px;
          background-color: #edf3fc; }
          #section .mSection .newApply ul li a {
            color: #000000;
            text-decoration: none; }
            #section .mSection .newApply ul li a:hover {
              color: red; }

    display: flex;

    width: 300px; }

      font-size: 24px;
